Medicine - O Occlusal paint Occlusal paint is a liquid containing the active ingredient salicylic acid. This is a type of medicine known as a keratolytic. Oestrogel (estradiol) Moderate-to-severe vasomotor symptoms of menopause. Vulvar and vaginal atrophy due to menopause. Olanzapine Olanzapine is an antipsychotic medication that affects chemicals in the brain. Olanzapine is used to treat the symptoms of psychotic conditions such as schizophrenia and bipolar disorder (manic depression) in adults and children who are at least 13 years old. Olmesartan Tablets Olmesartan is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure). Olumiant Tablets Olumiant Tablets (Baricitinib) is used to treat rheumatoid arthritis. It helps decrease pain, tenderness, and swelling in the joints. Omacor Capsules Omacor belongs to a group of so called reducers of cholesterol and triglycerides. Omacor is used: • together with other medicines for treatment after a heart attack. • to treat certain forms of increased triglycerides (fats) in the blood after changes to the diet have not worked. Omega 3 Fish Oils Recent work reports that the omega-3 fatty acid docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) found in fish oil increases the production of LR11, a protein that is found at reduced levels in Alzheimer's patients and which is known to destroy the protein that forms the "plaques" associated with the disease. Omeprazole Omeprazole is a generic brand of Losec and is used to treat a variety of stomach problems involving irritation due to stomach acid. Omesar Plus Omesar plus tablets contain two active ingredients, olmesartan and hydrochlorothiazide. Olmesartan is a type of medicine called an angiotensin II receptor antagonist. Hydrochlorothiazide is a type of medicine called a thiazide diuretic. These are both medicines used to lower high blood pressure. Omesar Tablets Omesar (Olmesartan) is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure). Omnexel Tablets - (Tamsulosin) Omnexel Tablets - (Tamsulosin) is an alpha-blocker that relaxes the muscles in the prostate and bladder neck, making it easier to urinate. Onbrez breezhaler Onbrez breezhaler contains the active ingredient indacaterol, which a type of medicine called a long-acting beta 2 agonist.   One-Alpha (alfacalcidol) One-Alpha capsules, drops and injection all contain the active ingredient alfacalcidol, which is a form of vitamin D. Opatanol Eye Drops (olopatadine) Opatanol is used to treat the eye symptoms of seasonal allergic conjunctivitis (inflammation of the eyes caused by pollen in patients with hayfever). These include itching, redness and swelling. Oprymea (Pramipexole) Oprymea (pramipexole) tablets and Oprymea (pramipexole) prolonged-release tablets both contain the active ingredient pramipexole, which is a type of medicine called a dopamine agonist. Optimax Capsules Optimax (L-Tryptophan) is used in the treatment of depression when other treatments have not worked, and as an add-on treatment to other anti-depressant medication. Oralair sublingual ORALAIR is a sublingual (under the tongue) grass allergy immunotherapy tablet used to treat symptoms of allergies to the grass pollens in ORALAIR. It is an allergy immunotherapy, which means that it works differently than other medicines you may take when you experience bothersome allergy symptoms. Orencia (abatacept) Injection Orencia infusion and injection contain the active ingredient abatacept, which is a type of medicine called a selective immunosuppressant. It is used to treat severe forms of rheumatoid arthritis. Osteofos D3 Osteofos D3 is a calcium and vitamin D3 supplement for the treatment of certain bone conditions in the elderly. Both calcium and vitamin D are found in the diet and vitamin D is also produced in the skin following exposure to the sun.   OsvaRen Tablets Treatment of hyperphosphatemia associated with chronic renal insufficiency in patients undergoing dialysis (haemodialysis, peritoneal dialysis). Pumpkin Seeds Puregon Injection Pyridoxine Tablets Medicine - P Pacemaker A pacemaker is a small device, about the size of a pocket watch, that's placed under the skin near your heart to help control your heartbeat. Panadol (OTC) Paracetamol Paracetamol is a mild pain killer and anti-pyretic (reduces temperature). The tablets are recommended for use in the short-term management of headaches, including migraine and tension headaches, backache, rheumatic and muscle pain, period pains, nerve pains, toothache and for relieving fever. Panadol Extra (OTC) Panadol extra products contain the painkiller paracetamol in combination with caffeine - read on for advice on their use, warnings and side effects. Pantium - (Pantoprazole) Pantium is a generic brand of Protium. Pantium is used to treat certain conditions caused by too much acid being produced in the stomach. Pantoflux - (Pantoprazole) Pantoflux is a generic brand of Protium. Pantoflux is used to treat certain conditions caused by too much acid being produced in the stomach. Pantoloc - (Pantoprazole) Pantoloc is a generic brand of Protium. Pantoloc is used to treat certain conditions caused by too much acid being produced in the stomach. Pantoprazole Pantoprazole is a generic brand of Protium. Pantoprazole is used to treat certain conditions caused by too much acid being produced in the stomach. Pantup - (Pantoprazole) Pantup is a generic brand of Protium. Pantup is used to treat certain conditions caused by too much acid being produced in the stomach. Paracetamol Paracetamol is a mild pain killer and anti-pyretic (reduces temperature). The tablets are recommended for use in the short-term management of headaches, including migraine and tension headaches, backache, rheumatic and muscle pain, period pains, nerve pains, toothache and for relieving fever. Paracodin Tablets/Syrup/Drops Paracodin tablets contain the active ingredient dihydrocodeine, which is a type of medicine called an opioid painkiller.  Paralink Suppositories 180mg (OTC) Treatment of mild to moderate pain and fever in babies and children ≥3 months especially when oral administration is not appropriate e.g. post-operative pain or patients with nausea and/or vomiting. Paramax (paracetamol and metoclopramide) Paramax tablets and sachets contain two active ingredients, paracetamol and metoclopramide. Paracetamol is a painkiller and metoclopramide is an antisickness medicine. Paramol Tablets Paramol tablets contain two active ingredients, paracetamol and dihydrocodeine, also known as co-dydramol.  Paratabs (OTC) Paracetamol Paracetamol is a mild pain killer and anti-pyretic (reduces temperature). The tablets are recommended for use in the short-term management of headaches, including migraine and tension headaches, backache, rheumatic and muscle pain, period pains, nerve pains, toothache and for relieving fever. Pariet Pariet tablets contain the active ingredient rabeprazole, which is a type of medicine called a proton pump inhibitor. Rabeprazole is also available without a brand name, ie as the generic medicine. Rabeprazole acts in the stomach to decrease the production of stomach acid. Paroser - (Paroxetine) Paroser (Paroxetine) is a treatment for adults with depression and/or anxiety disorders. The anxiety disorders that ‘PAROSER’ is used to treat are: obsessive compulsive disorder, panic disorder, social anxiety disorder, post traumatic stress disorder and generalised anxiety disorder. Penicillin Penicillins are a certain collection of antibiotics that eliminate infection causing bacteria. Also known in short as pen or PCN, they originate from a type of fungi called Penicillium fungi. Pentasa - (Mesalazine) Pentasa (Mesalazine) reduces inflammation in ulcerative colitis. It may be used during a flare up or after a flare up to help prevent further attacks from happening. Pepcid (Famotidine) Tablets Famotidine is a type of medicine called an H2 receptor antagonist. It acts in the stomach to decrease the production of stomach acid. Peppermint Peppermint (Mentha piperita) oil has been shown to have antispasmodic effects and may improve irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) symptoms such as cramping and bloating. Several clinical trials have used enteric-coated peppermint oil in IBS or recurrent abdominal pain in children. Significant..... Qlaira tablets contain two active ingredients, estradiol valerate and dienogest. Questran sachets Questran sachets contain the active ingredient colestyramine, which is a type of medicine called a bile acid sequestrant. Quetiapine Tablets Quetiapine is a psychotropic medication used to treat schizophrenia in adults and children who are at least 13 years old. Seroquel is also used in the treatment of major depression and bipolar disorder. Quinine Sulphate Tablets Treatment of falciparum (malignant tertian) malaria. Treatment and prevention of nocturnal leg cramps in adults and the elderly, when cramps cause regular disruption of sleep. Quinoderm Cream Quinoderm cream contains two active ingredients, benzoyl peroxide and potassium hydroxyquinoline sulphate. Qvar inhaler Qvar CFC-free inhalers, autohalers and easi-breathe inhalers all contain the active ingredient beclometasone dipropionate, which is a type of medicine known as a corticosteroid. Medicine - R Rabeprazole Rabeprazole tablets contain the active ingredient rabeprazole, which is a type of medicine called a proton pump inhibitor. Rabeprazole is a generic medicine. Rabeprazole acts in the stomach to decrease the production of stomach acid. Radiation Therapy Radiation Therapy is the medical use of ionizing radiation as part of cancer treatment to control malignant cells. Radiosurgery Radiosurgery is a type of stereotactic radiotherapy, which aims radiotherapy beams very precisely at the tumour. Stereotactic radiotherapy is usually broken up into between 6 and 25 treatments. Ramipril Tablets Ramipril can be used for the following conditions: • To treat high blood pressure • To treat heart failure. • If you have recently had a heart attack • To treat kidney problems caused by Type II diabetes in people with high blood pressure. Ranitidine Tablets To heal and stop ulcers in the stomach, or the part of the gut it empties into (the duodenum) To stop stomach ulcers when they are a side effects of some medicines Raporsin Tablets (Doxazosin) Raporsin is one of a group of medicines called alpha-blockers. It is used to treat high blood pressure, or the symptoms caused by enlargement of the prostate gland in men. Rasilez Tablets This medicine is to help lower high blood pressure. Razolager - Lansoprazole Razolager stop cells in the lining of the stomach from producing too much acid. This can help prevent ulcers from forming or assist the healing process. By decreasing the amount of acid, they can also help to reduce acid reflux related symptoms such as heartburn. Razole - (Rabeprazole) Razole tablets contain the active ingredient rabeprazole, which is a type of medicine called a proton pump inhibitor. Razole is a generic medicine. Razole acts in the stomach to decrease the production of stomach acid. Rebif Injection Rebif (Interferon) is used for the treatment of relapsing multiple sclerosis. MS is said to be relapsing if you have had two or more acute episodes in the last two years. Rectogesic Rectal Ointment Rectogesic 4 mg/g Rectal Ointment is indicated in adults for relief of pain associated with chronic anal fissure.   Regurin (trospium) Regurin tablets and Regurin XL prolonged release capsules both contain the active ingredient trospium chloride, which is a type of medicine called an anticholinergic (or antimuscarinic) muscle relaxant. It works by relaxing the involuntary muscle that is found in the wall of the bladder. Relpax - (Eletriptan) Relpax works by stimulating receptors called serotonin (or 5HT) receptors that are found in the brain. This improves the symptoms felt during a migraine. Relvar ellipta inhaler Relvar ellipta inhaler contains two active ingredients, fluticasone and vilanterol. Remicade Injection - (Infliximab) Remicade is used in adults for the following infl ammatory diseases: Rheumatoid arthritis, Psoriatic arthritis, Ankylosing spondylitis, Psoriasis, Ulcerative colitis. Remicade is also used in adults and children 6 years of age or older for: Crohn’s disease. Reminyl Reminyl is a drug prescribed to treat symptoms of mild to moderately severe dementia in Alzheimer’s. Requip Requip (Ropinirole) is used to treat Parkinson’s disease. Resolor (Prucalopride) Resolor tablets contain the active ingredient prucalopride, which is a type of medicine called a serotonin (or 5HT) agonist. Revlimid Revlimid in combination with dexamethasone is used to treat adult patients who have been diagnosed with multiple myeloma. Multiple myeloma is a type of blood cancer that affects the white blood cells that produce antibodies. Rhinocort Nasal Spray Rhinocort aqua nasal spray contains the active ingredient budesonide, which is a type of medicine known as a corticosteroid (or steroid). Corticosteroids are hormones produced naturally by the adrenal glands that have many important functions, including control of inflammatory responses. Budesonide nasal spray is also available without a brand name, ie as the generic medicine.
